result.execSummary:
The defendant Earl J Baker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Earl J Baker
parties.address: 1420 State Hwy 25 North, Barron County Jail, Barron, WI 54812

supervisions.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Must pay a $200.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

Must report to Jail no later than 7/25/2016, at 6:30 p.m.
Subject to Good Time & Work Release.
May serve in another County as long as there is no cost to Polk County.
**DATE TO REPORT TO JAIL AMENDED TO NO LATER THAN 10/01/2016, AT 6:30 P.M. (7/20/16)**
Concurrent with: ***any other sentence (2/17/17)***
